duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, maintain, and improve assembly processes and evaluate process specifications.
Collaborate with Quality Engineers on process improvement, monitoring tools, root causes, and corrective actions.
Drive production schedules, support new product introduction and development, and assist in safety compliance (ISO).
Provide production ready documentation with equipment setup and programs, and make process and efficiency improvements.
Monitor equipment performance, make minor adjustments, clear minor machine difficulties, and perform maintenance and repairs under supervision.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s Degree, vocational or technical training, or equivalent.
